name: rust_game_server
title: Rust Server
description: A vanilla Rust server with metrics.

variables.name: rust_server_identity
variables.description: Mainly used for the name of the save directory

variables.name: rust_server_seed
variables.description: The server map seed, must be an integer

variables.name: rust_server_worldsize
variables.description: The map size, must be an integer

variables.name: rust_server_maxplayers
variables.description: Maximum players on the server, must be an integer

variables.name: rust_server_description
variables.default: This is a Rust server running inside a Docker container!

variables.name: rust_server_banner_url
variables.description: The publicly visible server banner image URL

variables.name: rust_server_save_interval
variables.description: Amount of seconds between automatic saves.

variables.name: rust_rcon_web
variables.description: Set to 1 or 0 to enable or disable the web-based RCON server

variables.name: rust_branch
variables.description: Sets the branch argument to use, eg. set to `-beta prerelease` for the prerelease branch

variables.name: rust_update_checking
variables.description: Set to 1 to enable fully automatic update checking, notifying players and restarting to install updates

variables.name: rust_update_branch
variables.description: Set to match the branch that you want to use for updating, ie. `prerelease` or `public`, but do not specify arguments like `-beta`
